content: I am a computer scientist working in the IT Artificial Intelligence team at UCB Pharma where I work on computer vision problems in the medical imaging domain. My research focuses on incorporating anatomical prior knowledge into deep neural networks and out-of-distribution generalization.

title: Joeri Nicolaes
